title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message:
Have this board that originally had corrosion damaged and PP20V_USBC was at 5v. Cleaned all up. Replaced U9080 and U9580, both were shorted out. Now PP20V_USBC is now at 20v but no current is being pulled. I'm getting 0v @ PP5V_G3S.

P5VG3S_EN - 0v
PPBUS_HS_3V3G3H_T - 12.2
PPBUS_G3H - 12.2

Any suggestion on where to start on this?

title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message: If you get the AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages, then try DFU restore.

title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message: Tried DFU restore and just never comes on, causing the DFU to faulted out after a while being stuck in install state.

title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message:
[URL unfurl="true"]https://mrmacintosh.com/how-to-restore-bridgeos-on-a-t2-mac-how-to-put-a-mac-into-dfu-mode/[/URL]

Did you try as explained here?
Is the best guide at the moment...

title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message:
Yep. Tried both revive and restore and both gave me the same message. It goes through the install process and just sits there for a while then gives the error. See picture.

[ATTACH type="full"]59506[/ATTACH]

title: 820-01041: No powering on. P5VG3S_EN - 0.0v
message:
I was thinking you cannot access DFU at all.
That guide says sometging about this error, I think.
Search on Internet about that error, may find more information.
